result.longName: Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited

assetProfile.address2: Ramindra Road Tarang Subdistrict Bangkhen District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited engages in the distribution, installation, maintenance, and service of telecommunication equipment in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Products and Solution, Services, and Service Provider. It offers telecommunications products and services, such as wireless telecommunication, network infrastructure, unified communication, and digital broadcasting systems; digital products and services, such as information storage and cloud computing, internet of things, video/data analytics and AI, and telemedicine systems, as well as data centers; and infrastructure system and alternative energy products and services for water management, renewable energy, electric vehicle technology, and waste management. The company also designs, develops, and manufactures satellite mobile vehicles. In addition, it offers professional services comprising pre-sales, implementation and installation, and after sales services, as well as rental services for various modls and digital TV broading system devices. Further, the company provides PlanetFiber that provides high speed internet through fiber optic network; and PlanetCloud, a smart cloud office system. Additionally, it offers cyber security solutions comprising network security, transaction security, and fire wall; network infrastructure, such as wireless, satellite, radio, network, and security; smart office solutions, including telepresence, UC/IP PBX, IP CCTV, and data security solutions; and digital TV broadcasting solutions, such as digital television transmitters and TV signal broadcasting systems. It serves broadcasting, telecommunications service provider, commercial, public, and international sectors. The company was formerly known as Technology Gateway Asia Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited in 1998. Planet Communications Asia Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Prapat  Rathlertkarn
companyOfficers.title: Vice Chairman, CEO, Pres & Company Sec.
